items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: React Alice Carousel is a lightweight, responsive, and customizable carousel component for React. It is well-suited for creating image sliders, content carousels, or other scrolling content. Below is an overview of how to use it, complete with examples.

It is well-suited for creating image sliders, content carousels, or other scrolling content. Below is an overview of how to use it, complete with examples.
